title: Retrofit Android
description: Learn how to integrate Retrofit, a type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java, into your Android projects.

description: Step-by-step guide on setting up a Java development environment on a Windows operating system.

description: Understand the process of obtaining OAuth tokens from Azure Active Directory using C#.

description: Guidelines and best practices for writing clear and informative commits when using Git version control.

description: Introduction to fundamental metrics in machine learning, including precision, recall, and F1 score, using Python.
